page.title: 20Out of School Hours
page.content:
Parents and friends of{Stretton {Handley School}join the children in extra-school activities. We had a very successful barbecue again this year. It rained but we had a marquee and everyone enjoyed themselves. Over Â£100 was raised for school library books. On another occasion we walked and cycled along the High Peak Trail. We have formed a Friends of the School Organisation to run functions. We are going to Blackpool in October.
One of{Clay Cross Centre's}evening classes meets in the school. The members can do any kind of sewing and there is a teacher who can help with the cutting and fitting of garments. -------------------------------------- { Mr.J.Ellis,the staff and children}of Stretton Handley School thank everyone for their help with this Project.
